name: Golden Galaxy
storyline: Mankind has just reached the outer edge of the galaxy and discovered its bizarre secrets; so naturally you should shoot everything with lasers! Defeat the galaxy lord Pulsar and his minions in this fast-paced space shooter! Pick from three primary weapons then collect money throughout each level to upgrade it and the rest of your arsenal!
summary:
Golden Galaxy is a game made by Scott Cawthon.
Released in 2013 for Android devices, Golden Galaxy features levels, enemies and characters from The Desolate Hope. The game can be downloaded for free on the Google Play store or App Store. The Windows version can also be purchased on Amazon.
